title: Pottery ladies. Part 3
creator_credit: Jenny Wilkes, Elizabeth Taylor-Mead and Arts Council of Great Britain
brief_description: Insight into the techniques and working conditions of the women employed to manufacture “Clarice Cliff” pottery under her direction. The influence of these women on Cliff’s career. Interviews with Gordon Elliot (historian), Susie Cooper (designer), Peggy Davies (sculptor) and Ethel Cliff.
